transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir main Mohsin bol raha tha. Ye IndiaMART pe mera account hai MS Engineers.
Customer: MS Engineers?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye.
Customer: Mujhe ye dikkat ho rahi thi maine Google mein search kiya na solar mounting structure to apna mera naam hi nahi aaya.
Customer: Sir aapka profile aapka profile kis location mein registered hai?
Customer: Udaipur.
Executive: Udaipur.
Executive: Kya hai sir profile ka naam MS Engineering Vivek.
Customer: Haan MS Engineers.
Executive: Sir kahan pe listing dekh rahe hain ki aapko nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Google pe apan ne dala na to.
Executive: Sir Google pe hum listing nahi commit karte hain na sir. Hum log to IndiaMART ke search page pe aapko listing dete hain na. Agar IndiaMART ke search page pe aapki listing agar main dikha doon to aapki IndiaMART ke search page pe listing aa rahi hai. Ye dekhiye main aapko haan jaise aluminium cables hain aapki. Theek hai? Maine aapke IndiaMART pe aapki jo Udaipur city hai wahan pe daal ke aapka dekha listing Udaipur Rajasthan mein aapki MS Enterprises ki listing aa rahi hai. MS Engineers sorry sabse upar hi hai.
Customer: Abhi maine IndiaMART pe IndiaMART pe solar structure search kara theek hai?
Executive: To haan haan Udaipur daliye enter your search and location mein daliye.
Customer: To ye second number pe mera MS Engineers aa raha hai ek number.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To sir aapka jo agar aap se koi bade package mein hoga to wo upar dikhega aur aapka uske baad dikhega kyunki aapka jo package mere sath chal raha hai wo chal raha hai basic ka. Hai na?
Customer: Achha. To sir agar aapka koi aap se bada hoga na to pehle uski listing wahan pe dikhegi.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai. Theek hai Google pe likha hai.
Executive: Nahi Google pe hum log sirf dikh sakta hai lekin hum log commit apne customer ko nahi karte hain ki Google pe listing dikhegi. Kyunki Google sir Google ka search page ka jo logic hai wo different hai. Hamare search page ka jo logic hai wo different hai aur hum aapko IndiaMART pe promote kar rahe hote hain. Right? Hum aapko search karte hain IndiaMART ka. Google ki to Google AdWords ki service to alag hai na sir. Yahan se to kuch bhi lena dena nahi hai. Google pe meri baat suno Google pe search kiya aapne solar structure theek hai? Ab aapka ye jo ye jo IndiaMART pe main jaane ke baad bhi mera IndiaMART ke andar bhi nazar nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir agar aap Google ke us pe daloge to Google ka Google ka Google Google apna search page ek Ambika Green Udaipur solar isme mera nahi aa raha madam.
Executive: Sir suniye aluminium cable maine search kiya to sabse pehle aata hai aapka Amazon wagera aa raha hai uske baad IndiaMART ka directory page aa raha hai. Sir IndiaMART solar structure search karo.
Executive: Sir solar structure hi agar main search karu to pehle IndiaMART ka directory page aayega. Directory page pe aane ke baad aapko all over India page khulta hai jahan pe aapko leading supplier star supplier customer dikh rahe honge. Uske baad aapko enter your cities aata hai ki aap enter your city mein type kijiye Udaipur Rajasthan aur jaise haan aap Udaipur Rajasthan karenge to MS Engineer Udaipur aapki rating five ki aa rahi hai aur aapka email bhi sab kuch verified member from 11 years sab kuch likh ke aa raha hai.
Customer: Ye bhi aa raha hai ye bhi ye bhi aa raha hai ye bhi.
Executive: Sir aapko na main WhatsApp pe bhej rahi hoon aap dekh lijiye Google pe aa raha hai Ambika Green Energy theek hai suno.
Customer: Sir kya bol rahe hain?
Executive: Ambika Green Energy aa raha hai phir uske baad Agarwal Nidhi Solar aa raha hai phir uske baad sir aap jis tarike se hum sir to wo sir wo bade customer aap all over India pe dekh rahe hain na.
Customer: Keyword nahi dal rakha madam. Samajh nahi aa rahi baat.
Customer: Apun mere ko abhi keyword dalwana hai solar mounting structure solar structure manufacturer ye keyword nahi dal rakhe hain apan ne.
Executive: Solar apan ne solar mounting structure.
Executive: Solar mounting structure theek hai. Haan manufacturer solar manufacturer.
Customer: Haan Ambika solar manufacturer.
Executive: Sir sir sir sir abhi aapka MS Engineer aapka teesre chauthe panchve number pe MS Engineer aa raha hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Achha aa raha hai. MS sir aa raha hai Ambika sabse upar aa raha hai phir Agarwal Nidhi Solar system aa raha hai phir solar solar tech aa raha hai phir aapka Tarwa energy aa raha hai phir MS Engineer aa raha hai panchve number pe.
Customer: Mujhe panchve chhathe saatve number pe bhi nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Sir aapko pata nahi kaise nahi dikh raha hai main WhatsApp pe aapko bhej rahi hoon aap dekh lijiye.
Executive: Sir listing show kar rahi hai aap dekh lijiye main ek second rukiye main aapko bhej rahi hoon.
Customer: Solar panel mounting structure ye search kara hai.
Executive: Sunai nahi de raha sir rukiye ek second main video meeting ki ek link bhej rahi hoon aap isko join kariye.
Customer: Kya karna hai?
Executive: Sir join kariye link bheja hai aapko.
Customer: Ek minute. Aapke registered email ID pe bheja hai.
Customer: Konsa pe bheja hai? WhatsApp pe bheja hai kya?
Executive: Haan WhatsApp WhatsApp nahi email pe bheja hai sir.
Customer: Kahan bheja?
Customer: Dikha sir?
Customer: Join karna hai kya?
Executive: Sir join kijiye.
Customer: Join karu kya?
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir hua?
Executive: Sir join kijiye.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Sir join kijiye hum hum log wait kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Join nahi ho raha madam.
Executive: Kya nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Join nahi ho raha.
Executive: Kya aa raha hai join karne ke liye sir?
Customer: Ye bata raha background.
Executive: Kya naam hai Vivek sir ko MS Engineer jo maine calendar book kiya hai unko WhatsApp pe add karo.
Executive: Kahan rakhna hai? Aur ye wali link bhejo sir ko sir ko listing ki problem aa rahi hai aur ye ye link bhejo sir ko WhatsApp pe aur sir dusri cheez aapko hum log yahan pe dikha bhi de rahe hain ki kahan pe show kar raha hai.
Customer: Haan suno. Main jo keyword bhejunga wo dal sakte ho kya?
Executive: Sir maine solar mounting mountinging structure hi dala hai maine aur kuch nahi dala hai sir. Nahi wo nahi keh raha hu aap mere account mein dal sakte ho kya matlab main jo keyword bata raha hu na main bata raha hu aap me haan jab hamari profile banegi tab.
Executive: Sir main Vivek ko call de rahi hoon Vivek na aapke sara keyword dalenge account manager wahi hai wo dusre line pe busy the isliye call mere paas land hui thi Vivek baat karo.
Customer: Okay Vivek.
Executive: Hello. Kya jama denge yahan pe?
Executive: Hello. Tere ke sare nahi yahan pe. Hello. [inaudible] paisa lagata nahi.
Executive: Hello sir aawaz aa rahi hai hello.
Customer: Sahi tarike se jama denge.
Executive: Hello sir hello.
Customer: Haan haan namaste.
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri hello. Haan aa rahi hai sir main main ye keh raha hoon. Haan sir mere kya keyword nahi dal rakhe hain to jo jo samne wala customer jo search karta hai na wo keyword bahut sare matlab nahi dal rakhe hain to ek to jo apan regular jo search karte hain na. Haan to wo apan dalenge tabhi mera naam aayega. Hai na? Matlab aap matlab aap ek commonly common kya hota hai solar mounting structure manufacturer. Haan kya ye normally aadmi search karta hai Google pe.
Executive: Ji theek hai. Hai na? To ek to ye dalo phir aap dalo solar structure manufacturer. Main main aapke main aapke samne hi kare deta hoon na sir isko main aapko aapke paas link link jo bheji gayi na aap aapko mil gayi ye link ya main aapko WhatsApp pe send kar doon main aapko. Ek minute.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute chalu rakhna. Ji sir ji sir.

Sir aawaz aa rahi hai sir hello.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Okay okay okay okay.

Customer: Sabhi jama denge hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan link main bol ke batau ya wo Google Meet join karna padega?
Executive: Google Meet join kar lenge to jyada effective rahega usme kya hai aap samne se dekh lenge na to aap usme jyada clear ho jayega ki sahi ho raha hai ya nahi ho raha hai kya hai ki kuch kuch cheeze hai na aapko business aap kar rahe hain na jaise ki to aapko jyada uski jankari hai isliye mujhe aap bata denge practically to sahi rahega wo hai na.
Executive: To sir aapko link mil gayi hai ya WhatsApp pe send karu main aapke?
Customer: WhatsApp pe send kar do.
Executive: Okay main last mein 303 isi number pe send kar du kya?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Okay okay okay ek minute rukiyega sir bas ek minute dijiyega.
Customer: Thik hai tuta panel rakh do taki tuta kitne panel hai?

Executive: Ek second. Wo rakhna patiya watiya rakh do.
Executive: Check kariye sir zara link aayi hogi aapke paas dekh liya jaise ki aapne abhi us pe click karke usko join kar lijiye main bhi idhar se join kiye hua hoon waise to.

Executive: Sir kya hai ki aapke The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's company not appearing in Google search.

- Wants to add keywords to IndiaMART profile.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed listing appears on IndiaMART search page.

- Executive shared listing via WhatsApp.

- Transferred call to account manager for keyword updates.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will update keywords.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, keywords, google, search, profile
